title: The Thirty Days of Justine!
subtitle: Every day, at some time, a new clue will be available for a gift or activity! Check this app in the morning to know what time!
instruction: Every day, at some time, a new clue will be available for a gift or activity! Check this app in the morning to know what time!

title: You've Always Been Sweet
subtitle: And you're mostly addicted to sweets
instruction: Check behind the pillows for some extra sweets!

title: You've got a great sense of occasion
subtitle: And I do, too!
instruction: Check the coffee cabinet for something you'll use all month!

title: You've always been obsessed with the Holocaust
subtitle: You always were before I met you, and here's something to help us learn more!
instruction: Check in our calendar for a Holocaust related experience!

title: You've always read all the time!
subtitle: And not just reading to learn, but reading for fun, too!
instruction: Check the bon-bon room bookshelf for some blast from the past books, that maybe will be useful in the future, too!

title: You loved girly shows!
subtitle: Even if I absolutely hate them!
instruction: Check the coffee cabinet for some Girlmore Girls' paraphrenalia

title: You (and Jordan) were obsessed with Harry Potter!
subtitle: And you said you wanted to be again!
instruction: Check the bookshelf for the first of the HP books so you can start to re-read them!

title: You were never a rebel!
subtitle: But maybe now you can be!
instruction: Check the snack cabinet for some rebellious snacks that I remember always wanting.

title: You always had cold feet!
subtitle: Or maybe that's just now!
instruction: Check your sock drawer for some new socks to help keep you warm

title: You love breakfast!
subtitle: And birthday breakfast is extra special!
instruction: Alex will make you some Brithday Cake Scones and sweet potato biscuits for the week!

title: You're the world's best travel buddy!
subtitle: And we'll have to travel all the time because of it!
instruction: Check by the computer for a new picture to put on our wall, from our time in Prague!

title: You're always fun to watch the stars with!
subtitle: And we even have them on our bedroom wall!
instruction: Ask Alex for help and we'll put up the exact night sky from the day we met on our bedroom wall!

title: You sometimes get exhausted, though...
subtitle: And you need something to help you relax!
instruction: No, not weed.  Look by the bed for some massage oil that I made!

title: You're the best relaxer!
subtitle: And Sundays are your relaxing days!
instruction: Check under the spare sink for some help with relaxing and bathing!

title: You're a dessert fiend!
subtitle: And you used to bake a lot of bread!
instruction: Check in the cabinet with the pots for a gift to help us up our baking game!

title: You're super into fitness!
subtitle: And it makes you really fit!
instruction: You always complain about not having workout T-Shirts. I put one in your workout clothes!

title: You're super sexy!
instruction: Check in the bedside table for some things that used to make it on our Spring/Summer/Fall/Winter lists all the time.

title: You've been loving your workout plans!
instruction: And I set up a keepsake box for all of your workout stuff!

title: You love a good shower!
instruction: And I bought this awesome looking shower head for our next place, wherever it is!

title: And you like to pamper yourself in the shower!
instruction: Check in the shower for a peppermint sugar scrub I made you!

title: You'll only get more beautiful!
subtitle: And you looked beautiful for our wedding!
instruction: Today is the first day of 'The Ghost of Justine Future'! So all the rest of the things will be about our future.  First, look on the wall in the bedroom for some new wall art!

title: You and I will always enjoy happy hour!
subtitle: And these should help!
instruction: We don't know what city we'll end up in, so I couldn't finish these, but I'm going to get some coasters laser cut for us.  I'll bring out the design when you ask!

title: You'll finish your Kanken so quickly at this rate!
subtitle: And I'll be happy to tag along!
instruction: Check the center console of the car for your outstanding patches!

title: Obligatory 'Your future is so bright you need sunglasses'!
instruction: Check the sunglass section of the car for some sunnies!

title: You and I are great travel buddies!
subtitle: But I know family can ve difficult!
instruction: I'll bring you a Florida survival kit!

title: Sometimes you're forgetful...
subtitle: But this should help for the future!
instruction: Look in front of the computer for something to help with your password problems!

title: We'll get to see a lot of plays wherever we move!
subtitle: But one more won't hurt!
instruction: Check in the bon-bon room for tickets to an IRT play for our Sunday Birthday Playdate!
